p: Based on compound 5 and previously published compound 2 ( Table 1), a new series of DDX3X inhibitors was synthesized, validated as inhibitors of both DDX3 helicase in vitro and the WNV replication [ 16]. The most interesting compound proved to be compound 6, which showed high activity against WNV and a good safety profile. The docking studies showed that the compound acts as a competitive inhibitor towards a template in the helicase binding site. Compound 6 displayed the highest antiviral activity among the series, inhibiting WNV replication by 98% at 20 Î¼M.
